verses.verse: Seven <S%H7651><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We will eat <S%H398><s%> our own bread, <S%H3899><s%> and wear <S%H3847><s%> our own clothing: <S%H8071><s%> only let us be called <S%H7121><s%> by your name. <S%H8034><s%> Take away <S%H622><s%> our reproach. <S%H2781><s%>"

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s branch <S%H6780><s%> will be beautiful <S%H6643><s%> and glorious, <S%H3519><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> will be the beauty <S%H1347><s%> and glory of <S%H8597><s%> the survivors <S%H6413><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

It will happen, <S%H7604><s%> that he who is left in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and he who remains <S%H3498><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> even everyone who is written <S%H3789><s%> among the living <S%H2416><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

when the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall have washed away <S%H7364><s%> the filth <S%H6675><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and shall have purged <S%H1740><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from its midst, <S%H7130><s%> by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of justice, <S%H4941><s%> and by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of burning. <S%H1197><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will create <S%H1254><s%> over the whole habitation <S%H4349><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and over her assemblies, <S%H4744><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and smoke <S%H6227><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and the shining <S%H5051><s%> of a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> by night; <S%H3915><s%> for over all the glory <S%H3519><s%> will be a canopy. <S%H2646><s%>

There will be a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> for a shade <S%H6738><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%> from the heat, <S%H2721><s%> and for a refuge <S%H4268><s%> and for a shelter <S%H4563><s%> from storm <S%H2230><s%> and from rain. <S%H4306><s%>
